name: modperl-user
unsub: To unsubscribe send an empty email to mailto: modperl-unsubscribe@perl.apache.org
summary: The mod_perl users mailing list is available for mod_perl users and developers to share ideas, solve problems and discuss things related to mod_perl and the Apache::* modules.
sub: To subscribe send an empty email to mailto: modperl-subscribe@perl.apache.org
help: Send an empty email to mailto: modperl-help@perl.apache.org
